name: Compound (itch) (Fauix)
description:
A student project I have been working on, Compound is a single player fast paced arena shooter dungeon crawler where the player must battle their way through enemy defenses and bosses to reach the apex.

The visuals are intentionally simple due to the nature of the class this was originally for.

The game is built on using a variety of movement mechanics which can be used in tandem for significant boosts in performance as one becomes more experienced.

External Credits:
Infraction (Music)
